titles.title: Disabled Veterans Sports and Special Events Promotion Act of 2005
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish in the Department of Veterans Affairs an Office of National Veterans Sports Programs and Special Events.
Disabled Veterans Sports and Special Events Promotion Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Disabled Veterans Sports and Special Events Promotion Act of 2005 - Establishes in the Department of Veterans Affairs an Office of National Veterans Sports Programs and Special Events, headed by a Director, to promote, establish, and carry out programs for the participation of disabled veterans in approved sporting and other events.
